attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
genocide in sri lanka

Mr prime minister Sri lanka government is killing innocent tamils in sri lanka. An ethnic clensing is going on in sri lanka. In past 26 years we are fighting our democratic rights.We have been descriminated and humiliated since British left us 60 yrs ago in the hands of ruthless sinhala governmet This is the only government that kills it's minority tamils. Prime minister you must be aware of the situation in srilanka. The governmnet is not allowing any foreign media or aid agencies.please dont allow an another Ruwanda or Kosova to happen . please don't be silent mr Prime Minister. We hope that you will intervene in this matter. So many members of your parliment are supporting our cause including the right hon keith Vaz

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
